Value: North India, South India, West India, Central India, East India
Eco-friendly and biodegradable packaging materials for Indian food/FMCG
Material Recommendation, Cost Optimization, Compliance Verification, Regional Supplier Matching, Sustainability Scoring, Agricultural Applications
Regression (biodegradability prediction), Recommendation Systems, Multi-objective Ranking, Classification (material category), Clustering (similar materials)
Python (Pandas, Scikit-learn, PyTorch, TensorFlow), R (data.table, dplyr, caret), Excel, Google Sheets

1. Download Eco_Friendly_Materials_India_Adapted_9000_Records.xlsx from repository. 2. Load in Python with pd.read_excel() or in Excel/Google Sheets directly. 3. Refer to Feature_Dictionary sheet for field descriptions. 4. Use Dataset_Guide.md for workflow examples.
